___StartTime.description: The time when the ComputingManager started the job (DateTime_t)

___ComputingManagerExitCode.description: The exit code provided by the ComputingManager

___RequestedSlots.description: The number of slots requested for the job

___OtherMessages.description: Optional messages provided by either the Grid layer or the ComputingManager

___StdIn.description: The name of the file used for standard input

___ComputingManagerEndTime.description: The time when the job ended according to the ComputingManager (DateTime_t)

___SubmissionTime.description: The time when the job was submitted to the ComputingEndpoint (DateTime_t)

___UsedTotalWallTime.description: The total wall clock time consumed by the job so far (slots*seconds)

___StdOut.description: The name of the file used for standard output

___Error.description: The error messages as provided by the software components involved in the management of the job

___ComputingManagerSubmissionTime.description: The time when the job was submitted to the ComputingManager (DateTime_t)

___RequestedApplicationEnvironment.description: The AppName and Version of the requested ApplicationEnvironments

___ExecutionNode.description: Hostnames associated with the ExecutionEnvironments running the job

___UsedTotalCpuTime.description: The total CPU time consumed by the job so far (seconds)

___Owner.description: The Grid identity of the job's owner

___Queue.description: The name of the ComputingManager queue that held the job before execution

___ExitCode.description: The exit code as returned by the main executable code or script of the job

___WaitingPosition.description: The position of the job in the queue, if the job is waiting

___RequestedTotalWallTime.description: The total wall clock time requested by the job

___SubmissionClientName.description: The name of the software client used to submit the job

___SubmissionHost.description: The name of the host from which the job was submitted

___WorkingAreaEraseTime.description: The time when working area will be removed from storage (DateTime_t)

___EndTime.description: The time when the job ended in the Grid layer (DateTime_t)

___LogDir.description: The name of the directory which contains job logs

___LocalIDFromManager.description: The local ID assigned by the ComputingManager

___UsedMainMemory.description: The physical RAM currently used by the job (MB)

___IDFromEndpoint.description: The ID assigned by the ComputingEndpoint

___LocalOwner.description: The local user name of the job's owner

___StdErr.description: The name of the file used for standard error

___RequestedTotalCPUTime.description: The total CPU time requested by the job

___ProxyExpirationTime.description: The expiration time of the Grid proxy associated with the job (DateTime_t)
